name: LendingPoolParametersProvider
description: LendingPoolParametersProvider. stores the configuration parameters of the Lending Pool contract*.

functionDecorators.name: getRebalanceDownRateDelta
functionDecorators.description: returns the delta between the current stable rate and the user stable rate at which the borrow position of the user will be rebalanced (scaled down)*.

functionDecorators.name: getFlashLoanFeesInBips
functionDecorators.description: returns the fee applied to a flashloan and the portion to redirect to the protocol, in basis points.*.

functionDecorators.name: initialize
functionDecorators.description: initializes the LendingPoolParametersProvider after it's added to the proxy.

functionDecorators.name: getMaxStableRateBorrowSizePercent
functionDecorators.description: returns the maximum stable rate borrow size, in percentage of the available liquidity.*.
